description:
This course teaches you the most important aspects of content marketing. The course goes well beyond simply concepts. It provides you with the best practices for researching, creating, distributing, and measuring content. There are 38 lessons (mostly video and detailed text), bonus resources. You will also have access to the marketing mind of teacher Miguel Bravo, founder of New Content Collective.

I strongly believe that content about your brand should be the centerpiece to your digital marketing efforts. We also believe that you should have affordable access to pro-level content marketing resources. That's why we packed this course with as much value as we could.
title: Content Marketing 101: Your Guide to Effective Blogging
